typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		S_Temp as string,
		S_Torque as string,
		S_TE as string,
		Mcode as string,
		Cuttingfluid as string,
		S_Gap as string,
		ServoTemp as string,
		S_Load as string,
		CuttingSpeed as string,
		ActualSpeedX as string,
		ActualSpeedY as string,
		ActualSpeedZ as string,
		ActualSpeedA as string,
		RateJOG as string,
		RateFastmove as string,
		RateHAND as string,
		FastmoveTmC as string,
		Fastmovespeed as string,
		AbsPos as string,
		MachPos as string,
		RelPos as string,
		Distance as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		S_TE as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		ActualSpeedY as string,
		ActualSpeedA as string,
		Cuttingfluid as string,
		S_Temp as string,
		EMT as string,
		ActualSpeedX as string,
		RateJOG as string,
		FastmoveTmC as string,
		RateFastmove as string,
		EventTime as string,
		S_Gap as string,
		RateHAND as string,
		CuttingSpeed as string,
		AbsPos as string,
		ActualSpeedZ as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Mcode as string,
		ServoTemp as string,
		Tag_D1_Analog as string,
		Fastmovespeed as string,
		MachPos as string,
		S_Torque as string,
		Distance as string,
		S_Load as string,
		RelPos as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		S_TE,
		CreateTime,
		ActualSpeedY,
		ActualSpeedA,
		Cuttingfluid,
		S_Temp,
		EMT,
		ActualSpeedX,
		RateJOG,
		FastmoveTmC,
		RateFastmove,
		EventTime,
		S_Gap,
		RateHAND,
		CuttingSpeed,
		AbsPos,
		ActualSpeedZ,
		SequentialNumber,
		Mcode,
		ServoTemp,
		Fastmovespeed,
		MachPos,
		S_Torque,
		Distance,
		S_Load,
		RelPos
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
